page.title: 10OUR AREA
page.content: OUR AREA IS QUIET AND PEACEFUL. NO BUSY TRAFFIC ONLY THE ODD VEHICLES DRIVE PAST LIKE CARS, LORRIES, VANS, MOTORBIKES AND ONLY ABOUT ONE BUS EVERY TWO HOURS. ALL THROUGH THE DAY WE CAN HEAR BIRDS SINGING AND CHIRRUPING IN THE BEAUTIFUL COUNTRYSIDE. IT IS NOT HILLY IT IS MOSTLY FLAT. THERE ARE NO SHOPS IN OUR AREA AND THERE IS ONLY ONE PUB CALLED THE JOHN BULL INN, A VERY OLD INN AT WATERSIDE. THERE IS A CANAL LOCK IN OUR AREA. THERE IS ONE GARDEN CENTRE WHERE THEY SELL POND FISH, FLOWERS AND POTS AND THERE IS A CAFE WHICH SELLS POP, CRISPS, TEA AND COFFEE. THERE ARE MANY FIELDS USED FOR CROPS. THERE ARE VERY FEW HOUSES AND VERY FEW COTTAGES. THERE IS ONE RIDING STABLE AND ONE MINK FARM. THERE ARE MANY FARMS IN OUR AREA WHICH IS LIGHTLY WOODED.
